documents.document: ... And the great and powerful Celebrity Twitter Feud Generator hath now given us... Baio vs Clement. Hmm. Didn't see that one coming.

Do the Citizen Thiel defenders feel soul-sick today about the actions of the far right administration he advises & backs? #MuslimBan #nzpol
But... but... Thiel is a "fascinating thinker" who LOVES New Zealand and we should just embrace him!! https://t.co/Ue2W9UEfX1
What's more intellectually honest? "Trump-loving" or "Advisor to & backer of far right Trump administration". Thiel… https://t.co/N4o9jMqZQG
@LewSOS Why single out Labour? Has *any* party ruled out working with Winston this time around?
More of what @EricCrampton would no doubt describe as NZ citizen Peter Thiel's "fascinating thinking" ... 🤔 https://t.co/hsBghSz7Dd
@FoxMarama @TeUruroaFlavell @Maori_Party Is removal of 360D a bottom-line for you?
@EricCrampton Yeah, where he says he has "little hope that voting will make things better" 👍🏽
@EricCrampton Doesn't sound good though does it? https://t.co/h9W1OHP65D
@secondzeit @EricCrampton @TheSpinoffTV In 2009 Thiel wrote that giving women the vote was bad for democracy... "fascinating thinking"?
@secondzeit @EricCrampton @TheSpinoffTV Are libertarian capitalist utopias on free-standing ocean platforms really a "beautiful proposal"?
I hope @FoxMarama & @TeUruroaFlavell watched this today. Your deal w Nick Smith isn't popular @Maori_Party. https://t.co/b4lx9GLVhV #nzpol
. @Maori_Party @FoxMarama @TeUruroaFlavell Are you listening to these people? Or just to Nick Smith? https://t.co/pt5BLoeJSo #nzpol
Of all the Kiwi stories struggling to be told on the screen right now, did we really need to tell #PorkPieMovie 's story again?
@nicgaston You are right and I'm totally not judging the person who threw the punch. Some of the response to it makes me uneasy
I disapproved of the Steven Joyce dildo-hit too -- which every single other person I know loved -- maybe I'm just a dryballs killjoy?
@nicgaston Protest = yes. Hell, yes. I don't think punching needs to be part of protest unless in self-defence though.
I don't believe it's a case of "punch every white supremacist you see or you're normalising them".
@nicgaston Yeah, I get that argument. I just don't think going around punching hate merchants is going to achieve anything other than lols
Or I actually just have a strange aversion to seeing people get punched. Even hateful, racist homophobic neo-Nazis.
I am a terrible person for not wholeheartedly endorsing the sucker-punching of hideous hate-mongering white supremacist homophobes.
Dame Tariana defends National while slamming Labour. Very Disingenuous. Maori Party have lost their way. https://t.co/xpHTCU1h0J #nzpol
Unlike Maori Party who voted to sell off state houses, cut a deal w/ Nick Smith to support RMA reforms, who vote wi… https://t.co/N4AXMpYyrb

Remember when Dubya, Cheney, Wolfowitz & Rumsfeld seemed like the apotheosis of uniquely sinister & buffoonish Republican self-parody?
Before I get to the news, I'd like to discuss this tweet. This tweet has THE most likes ever, period. Not taking any questions btw k bye.
Welcome to the post-truth age of the "alternative fact" 🤥 https://t.co/nNd5oOH7jY
Really missing the diplomatic, erudite, articulate, dignified intellectual and statesman George W. Bush right now. A man misunderestimated.

TV really is kicking cinema's ass these days. @TheCrownNetflix : Gorgeously shot, compelling performances & brilliant writing. Watch this!
@ShakingStick @transparency_a1 This is English's own "Springboks Tour Brain-Fade" moment. He was definitely still a CC skeptic as of 2013
LGNZ Pres & Hastings Mayor Lawrence Yule spent 2016 railing against National's dreadful Local Govt reforms. Now he wants to be a Nat MP.
@simonbwilson @keith_ng @TheSpinoffTV Great piece, but is English really so data nerdy? He was a climate change skeptic as recently as 2013
...blame on measures of poverty, causes, targets and remedies. I DGAF if he "cares": He's failed spectacularly on poverty and always will.
... be principled and really "care" (unlike Key), but he's been an abject failure on poverty. Consistently ducking, dodging and shifting...
...increase (About 1/5 of what a sole parent with one child would need to move out of poverty, according to UNICEF NZ). Bill English may...
How's that 2020 target tracking team? It's failed to provide regular 6 mthly reports. Only real achievement is extra $25 p/wk benefit...
In 2012 Nats & Māori Party set up Ministerial Committee on Poverty. Its aim was to end homelessness by 2020. Bill English is Chair. #nzpol
Pity the sad legacy of Barack Obama | Cornel West https://t.co/bcDw45ChA1
@ThomedySci And I think Marama Fox is making excuses for Bill because she so effusively endorsed him for PM after Key cut and run.
@ThomedySci Think he knew exactly what he was doing; Kick off Election Year with one of our most comforting national pastimes:Maori bashing
@ThomedySci @NZMorningReport And Marama Fox makes clear that Bill wouldn't have meant offence by deciding not to attend, so that's nice. 🙄
@simonbwilson @mizjwilliams @TheSpinoffTV Formidable but not an alchemist like Key. Lacks Key's instincts and straight-up ease with lying.
@simonbwilson @mizjwilliams @TheSpinoffTV English isn't going to get away with murder like Key did & I think Bennett out of depth
@simonbwilson @mizjwilliams @TheSpinoffTV The "centre-left" is surely in a far better position now than when Key was PM
@simonbwilson @mizjwilliams @TheSpinoffTV You make good points - I just wanted a cheap shot at the "boyish good looks" line tbh 😔However 1/2
@mizjwilliams @TheSpinoffTV You sure it's not satire? I mean: "boyish good looks"??
In which @FoxMarama makes excuses for the PM she heartily endorsed 🙄... He doesn't want to cause offence?? Come on. https://t.co/ppr1IILAk5
The beginning of the end for the Keatonaissance ? https://t.co/rjlikGTyap
Musicals so hot right now. Time for @TaikaWaititi to collab with @NeilFinn & @timfinnmusic on a jukebox musical of #SplitEnz songs...
@ggsacks Or he still hasn't got over Pierce Brosnan's "singing" from the first watch...
So many peeps be back at work today and I'm just like "Can I see a woman's face in my bath-mat?" #holidaylyfe https://t.co/sTwvhJw3J5
Very keen to hear @TeUruroaFlavell & @FoxMarama views on their buddy Bill English's decision not to attend Waitangi this year...
@mikjones24 @jfreewright Bitchslaption
Watching excerpts of Aug '68 debates between William F. Buckley Jr. & Gore Vidal. Inequality a major debate issue. How far we haven't come.
@philquin I'm assuming you think the research is bullshit?
@philquin He's of Filipino descent so it may have personal resonance for him. (And yes, of course his movies are dreadful).
@philquin Serious question: why do you think it is unacceptable/offensive for Schneider to point this out?
@Redbt68 @huihoppa @Mihi_Forbes Crap excuse anyway as her full name has been used widely throughout media reporting?
@totalfilm I'm cool with this as long as his Hunger Games hairstyle is nowhere to be seen.
@Ellipsister Your friend has great taste in music - awesome playlist!
What a week @huihoppa .An aspiring (Pākehā) National Party candidate in Napier now on FB waxing nostalgic about "Little Black Sambo" ... 🙄
@RFStew Bottom line? Māori Party *only* party to pledge support for Nats dangerous RMA legislation. @Olivefarmer @alison_dewes @FoxMarama
@PeopleofNZ This guy's a little concerned https://t.co/c5hp54R6bh
@AdamRutherford This film is more affecting, entertaining and fun than it has any right to be. Brilliant actioner.
@JJPalethorpe Yeah, i agree - despite numerous changes he did a good job of retaining the spirit of the character and the stories
Also so many arresting visual images... a neo-noirish urban look chucked in a blender with Terry Gilliam and Michel Gondry #dirkgently
Thing that struck me most about @DirkGentlyBBCA was how hugely irritating I found Dirk in Ep 1, but had grown to love him by finale.
Seems ridiculous, kind of Third Worldy that our ambos & paramedics need to work for a charity relying on donations etc for >20% of funding.
Wouldn't it be great if our ambulance service wasn't a charity and was actually a fully funded part of the health system?
@JJPalethorpe I just don't think everyone needs to have - in some cases - their lives ruined by a Twitter pile-on cos they tweeted dumb shit
@JJPalethorpe Clever you. I'm not excusing everyone and definitely not people with power & influence (the Leitchs & Boags of this world).
@JJPalethorpe No, that's not what I said.
@JJPalethorpe because of what was sometimes an ill-conceived tweet or joke.
@JJPalethorpe I thought keystone text was *some people* dont deserve to be hounded by 1000s of strangers, lose jobs, have lives ruined 1/2
How and why is a rape by someone you know not one of the "troubling ones" @NYPDnews ? https://t.co/Jw0DlBQve4
@nz_voter True! Calling them neolib sellouts doesn't though...
@MphoAK Happy NY to you too! Looking forward to Season 2 🤘🏽@DirkGentlyBBCA @fionadourif
@paulrust Or because so many indie filmmakers were trying to be "Tarantino-esque" ?
Seriously @TVONENZ ? *No* mention of Michelle Boag's outrageous "coffee-coloured" comments? How come? @NZQandA
@theomiro1 Yeah, you've kinda invalidated your point (whatever it was) with this churlish tweet, mate. Have a good one 👋🏽 @BeeFaerie
@theomiro1 Re Leitch -- yes, of course it has. Re Boag --no way. She shopped her skin tone comments around different news outlets @BeeFaerie
PLEASE: Someone alert the authorities and this poor boy's parents. https://t.co/i5fYWUHFNV
Finished @DirkGentlyBBCA binge. @fionadourif & @MphoAK are revelations. Smart & brilliantly executed bonkers sci-fi comedy-action-thriller.
@theomiro1 Has it occurred to u that language Leitch & Boag used ws attempt at making someone feel inferior based on ethnicity? @BeeFaerie
@theomiro1 Funny, cos your initial tweet seemed awfully like an attempt at shutting down debate. @BeeFaerie
@theomiro1 Thanks for that fine piece of Pākehāsplaining. @BeeFaerie
Fmr National Party Pres has no idea what casual racism is. Kinda like how our Nat PM doesn't kno what feminism is. https://t.co/FYeGjVO2qu
@ChrisBellNZ Any recollection on which ethnic group the coffee resembled?
I saw Napier trending and was worried the Mad Butcher was here to shoo the Maaaaris off Marine Parade.
